CustomField.formula:
IF(ISNULL(SBQQ__RenewalPrice__c),
IF(OR(ISNULL(SBQQ__NetPrice__c), ISNULL(SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c)),
IF(OR(ISNULL(SBQQ__CustomerPrice__c), ISNULL(SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c)), 0, (SBQQ__CustomerPrice__c / SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c) / 12),
(SBQQ__NetPrice__c / SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c) / 12),
SBQQ__RenewalPrice__c / 12)
CustomField.label: Average Monthly Unit Price
